scripts.ikupdate: npm i && npm update && npm audit fix --force && npm outdated
scripts.build: eslint . && rm -rfv ./dist && mkdir dist && cp -rv ./src/public/manifestDir ./dist/ && webpack --config webpack.production.config.js
scripts.dev: eslint . && rm -rfv ./dist && mkdir dist && cp -rv ./src/public/manifestDir ./dist && webpack serve --config webpack.dev.config.js --hot
scripts.ikclean: rm -fr node_modules/ package-lock.json dist/ && npm cache clean -vf && npm run ikupdate && npm run dev
scripts.ikcleanci: rm -fr node_modules/ dist/ && npm cache clean -vf && npm ci && npm outdated
